targets.query:
from(bucket: "${influxbucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._field == "value" and
    r.hostname == "${hostname}" and
    r.metric == "summary::ifw_updates::count"
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field: r.metric }))

from(bucket: "${influxbucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._field == "warn" and
    r.hostname == "${hostname}" and
    r.metric == "summary::ifw_updates::count"
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field: (r.metric + " Warning") }))

from(bucket: "${influxbucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._field == "crit" and
    r.hostname == "${hostname}" and
    r.metric == "summary::ifw_updates::count"
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field: (r.metric + " Critical") }))

from(bucket: "${influxbucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._field == "value" and

    r.metric == "defender::ifw_updates::count"

  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field: r.metric }))
